Catholic Church
Censorship
metadata.title: Mandement de Monseigneur l'Archevêque de Paris, par lequel il adresse aux fidéles de son diocèse la rétraction faite par le Sieur Jean-Martin de Prades, prêtre du diocèse de Montauban, de la thèse par lui soutenuë en Sorbonne le 18 novembre 1751
metadata.creator: Catholic Church.Archdiocese of Paris (France).Archbishop (1746-1781 : Beaumont)
Catholic Church. Archdiocese of Paris (France). Archbishop (1746-1781 : Beaumont)
Prades, Jean-Martin de
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 5 no. 92
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez C. F. Simon
metadata.description: Included the text of Prades' retraction, dated 6 April 1754

Bound with Censura S. Facultatis Parisiensis ... [27 January 1752]; and Mandement de Monseigneur l'Archevêque de Paris, portant condamnation d'une thèse soutenue en Sorbonne le 18. novembre 1751. 1752
metadata.notes:
No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Title on cover.
First numbered page is page number 4.
